Niagara RPC

From Niagara 4.1 onwards, a developer can easily create Remote Procedure Calls that can be invoked from FOX, BOX (and BajaScript) and through a Web Servlet. This provides developers with a secure RPC API without having to understand the underlying transport layer being used. For more information, please take a look at the comments in the following public APIs…

  • NiagaraRpc (interface comments)
  • NiagaraRpcServlet (class comments)
  • FoxProxySession (rpc method comments)
